about.title: About Us
about.content: {{brand}} {{fitness}} is Pune’s community for transformation—bringing science, passion, and energy together. From elite trainers to modern equipment and friendly vibes, we help you achieve lasting results and real joy in fitness. All are welcome—become your strongest self, with us!
